entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING IN EFFECT, Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
